name: @elevenlabs/types
description: AsyncAPI contracts and generated TypeScript types for ElevenLabs agent communication

scripts.generate: asyncapi generate models typescript ./schemas/agent.asyncapi.yaml -o ./generated/types --tsModelType interface && ls ./generated/types/*.ts | xargs -n1 basename | sed 's/.ts$//' | awk '{print "export * from \"./" $0 "\";"}' > ./generated/types/index.ts && prettier --write ./generated/types/**/*.ts
